<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cc—Carry clear      GE—Greater than or equal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LS—Lower or same    PL—Plus</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// CS—Carry set        GT—Greater than</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LT—Less than</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// EQ—Equal            HI—Higher</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">///                     LE—Less than or equal</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 8 -&gt; 16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::BRA8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::BRA16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::Bcc8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::Bcc16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::Bls8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M68k::Bls16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
